choices: Still having problems with Paris internet connection
They want you back at the hotel and won't specify why
Something else???
1.content:
You're name is Ivan. You're a random dude with no social life-you spend all day watching celeb news and other trash tv b/c you're bored with you're life as a computer guy, but none stand out to you more than Paris Hilton herself. You've watched her since she first hit it big in the early 2000s and still adore her now even though she's pushing 40. It's something about her beautiful face, her elegant composure, or her twisted personality that appeals to you and you always dream of meeting her.

One day-you're sent to work on fixing the internet connection for a premiere NYC hotel and expect it to be just another day at work when suddenly you hear cheering and people screaming and look outside the hotel to behold the legendary celebrity Paris Hilton walking into the hotel followed by her entourage. In a panic, you quickly retreat back to you're work fixing the connection in the vacant room that you're in wondering if you'll run across her during her stay. Suddenly you hear a barrage of footsteps and the door swings open to see a trio of muscular men in suits who looked to be security type personnel and one of them casts you a snarl and says "Hey kid-beat it this room you're stinking up is reserved for Paris Hilton and she'll be here any second so scram!"

"I'm just finishing fixing this crappy internet connection" you contend. "You'd think for the rate this place charges they could at least afford a better internet provider than AT&T". One of the dudes snarls again at you and begins to advance on you in an aggressive way. "Ease off, Joe!" an elegant yet stern voice says from behind him. Joe stopped dead in his tracks and bowed his head to be pushed out of the way by none other than the millionaire heiress herself. She was wearing an long elaborate white dress and walked up to you standin slightly taller than yourself in her high heels. "Sorry for this rudeness" she smiled. "His job is to protect me and sometimes he can be a jerk, thank you for making sure my room is working okay." You look at her an smile back "No prob-Ms Hilton-I'm sorry to have inconvenienced you." She nods at you and you take advantage of the oppportunity to make your exit from the awkward situation. Secretly, you're screaming on the inside from getting to meet you're favorite celeb, but are also happy to be relieved from the tense situation. Later that night, you get call from the hotel that she's staying at and...
1.title: I'm your biggest (or smallest) fan, Paris!!

choices: You feel lightheaded and pass out
You see a bright light and awake to a new world
Paris grabs you and asks you not to leave yet
11.content:
The fancy hotel Paris is staying at is furious saying that you didn't do an adequate job of fixing her internet connection and that Paris is complaining and demanding that you return and finish your work from earlier. Realizing that it could be your job on the the line-you hustle back to the hotel even though it's nearly midnight and you don't understand what could be wrong. You arrive at Paris suite and knock 3 times on her door. It opens to reveal the heiress wearing only a white bathrobe and slippers.

"I'm deeply sorry Ms Hilton" you say. I don't understand what could be wrong with your connection-it worked fine when I last left. She smiled back at you "It's no prob-please come in" she says opening the door allowing you to enter. As you walk in you notice her laptop sitting on the table logged into facebook and realize that something's not right. "Ugh-so your connection isn't working but you're still able to browse the internet?" you say looking at her in a confused manner.

Paris shuts the door and walks toward you and then laughs "Ok-you caught me my internet is working fine-but I felt bad about the way that Joe treated you earlier and just wanted to talk to you a little bit. She smiled and sits back down in the chair at her laptop an motions you to take a seat in the adjacent chair. You comply in a kind of stunned silence. "You know-she says most people I run across can't come near me without asking for a an autograph or my picture" she sighs "Aren't you going to ask me for something like that" she said looking at you curiously.

"No, Ms Hilton" you reply. "While it's true that I follow you and find you interesting and beautiful-I would never want to infringe on your privacy or life and am just trying to do my job".

"Really?" she says in genuine surprise. "So you say that you find me beautiful-what is it that you like about me?" You reply "Everything Ms Hilton-you smile, you're hair, your perfect physique-you just grab me as the perfect woman-almost as a goddess" you start to say then choke it back to avoid the embarrassment. Much to your suprise she just looks back at you with curiousness "That's cute-she says-if you think that I'm a goddess now-what would you say if I was 1000 ft tall" she say in a playful demeanor.

You look at her with a blank expression "I don't know-Ms Hilton" I guess that would be interesting, to say the least, but you'd have to be 1000 ft for me to know first". She laughs "that's a good observation" but what it rather than me being 1000 ft tall-what if I were normal height and you were just reeaaaallly small" she said with a look of mischief beginning to form on her face.

"I don't know, Ms Hilton-honestly it's hard to say, but since your internet seems to be working-I think I'm going to leave" As you're walking out suddently something happens...
11.title: Still having problems with Paris internet conne...

choices: I'd like to tell you my fantasy
It's time to appreciate your goddess
My feet really hurt and little men give the best foot rubs
112.content:
A bright red light flashed behind you as you're starting to exit and then suddenly you look around to nothing but giant structure around you and wonder if maybe you've gone unconscious or something. Suddenly the ground shakes and you look behind you to see a monster, but a very beautiful monster at that towering over you and realize by the white bathrobe that it's wearing that it's Paris Hilton!

"OMG" you scream "what has she done to me" You begin to run in a panic away from the monster but before you get more than a few inches, a giant soft hand encapsulates you and everything goes dark. When the hand opens up you stare in awe at the most beautiful and imposing thing you've every seen in staring at Paris Hilton's beautiful goddess like eyes that are each as large as you are. She smile revealing monster like teeth and then says "I'm very flattered that you think I'm a goddess-and I'd like to show you just what a true goddess that I can really be" she says and then brings you forward to give you the largest kiss you've ever received. After being nearly engulfed by her beautiful red lips she sets you on her desk and says...
112.title: You see a bright light and awake to a new world

choices: I dare not question a goddess like you, Paris
I refuse-this isn't right
Something else??
1121.content:
"I have a fantasy" Paris says and then elaborates "It's to have tiny shrunken men at my mercy worshiping and serving me. At this height-I can be a true goddess to you and you can truly serve me with your whole life" she says with a smirk on her giant face.

You squeak back in protest "I honestly don't know what to make of this Paris-I truly see you as a goddess-now more than ever-but I don't know if worshiping you at this size is what I really had in mind."

Paris laughs and replies "Oh-I know that you're probably overwhelmed because people always like to say that they want to worship me until they actually have to, but this is what a true goddess is, little guy" she guffaws. I know who you are, Ivan, I know you obsess over me and write blogs about me online about how beautiful I am and how you wish more than anything to serve me and be a part of my life. I requested you to be sent to work on my room's internet connection so that this could be possible and I used a special technology afforded to me by my billionaire friends to shrink you to only a few inches so now that fantasy of both yours and mine can be a reality. She looked at your stunned expression and says "So, my tiny slave-are you going to serve your goddess loyally or will I have to teach you to be obedient"...
1121.title: I'd like to tell you my fantasy

choices: A giant hand swoops to the rescue
Tinkerbell catches you and starts licking you
You're dog food
11212.content:
"No" you reply adamantly "I refuse to be a part of this-I actually have a life you know and I resent being reduced to your pet, so I demand that you change me back right now!"

Paris looks at you for a moment and then begins shake her head and laugh to herself. "Alright-tough guy-have it your way. But I should let you know that, even at that size, I don't consider you a pet-just my plaything. But if you refuse to be my plaything-then you would make a perfect plaything for my actual pet". With that she reaches down and pulls up a large travel case meant for small animals and unzips it. A huge monster pokes it's head it's head out and begins to bark out loud monstrous barks that pierce the air. "Hello, my little Tinkerbell-Paris cooed to her small Chihuahua. Look, my sweet girl, " she says motioning towards you "I bought you a new chew-toy!" With that she set the travel bag on the table you were standing and the monster jumped from its cage. It barreled towards you shaking the table with its footsteps. You scream and dive for cover behind a figurine on the table and just barely evade the monster's first charge. After realizing that it missed, the snarling beast turned its large head around, white teeth bared and saliva dripping from its lips in anticipation of the taste of your flesh. It roared and began a second charge-this time with it's head lowered and aimed towards you. You scream once again and this time can do nothing but cover yourself with your arms for the coming assault when suddenly...
11212.title: I refuse-this isn't right

choices: Alright-I clearly have no choice
Do you worst-I refuse to submit
You make a daring escape
112122.content:
You see the monsters mouth coming for you and realize that you have no chance of escape and close your eyes bracing yourself for the end when suddenly you feel a slimy pink sponge hit you and smother you in odious sticky liquid that knocks you over and causes you to open your eyes in surprise. This time you see the enormous Chihuahua standing directly over you but panting and wagging its tail. Again, Tinks goes in for another lick and you get slimed with dog slobber again but you mind less this time because you realize that you're not going to be eaten alive.

"Tinkerbell-you little shit" Paris exclaims angrily. Before the dog can give you third coating of saliva she grabs up the dog, scolding it angrily and puts it back in the travel case. She turns back looking at you menacingly "Alright-so pampered dog isn't going to do anything to you, but if you don't submit slave-I promise that I'll turn you into such a crushed state-that she'll think your her dog food-got it?"

You contemplate the situation and then answer her...
112122.title: Tinkerbell catches you and starts licking you

choices: Out of her mouth-into her lap
Backwards-down her throat
Something else?
1121221.content:
"Fine" you admit of thinking over the situation "Clearly-you can kill me whenever you like so I might as well submit"

Paris looks down at you and smiles, "Glad to hear that you've come to your senses slave-now-why don't we don't we come up with some chores for you to do." she ponders for a second and then exclaims "I know what you can do" she says excitedly and then scoops you up lifting you up to her giant mouth full of glimmering sharp teeth. "I have something stuck in the back of my mouth between my rear molars and I hate to floss-so why don't you crawl in there slave and remove the debris." You sigh and crawl inside the sticky wet cave using her tongue as a carpet and as you walk towards her molars-you can clearly see a hunk of something yellow between the two back ones that is clearly some form of half eaten food. Getting on top of the molar you begin to pull and heave at the hunk of food struggling to dislodge it. "Hurry up slave" she admonishes "Otherwise I might get tired of keeping my mouth open and might just have to bite down on you."

You pick up the pace pulling on the food with your strength when suddenly it pops out and you fall back on the back part of Paris tongue. She stars to gag and and her tongue makes a weird bucking motion flinging you...
1121221.title: Alright-I clearly have no choice

choices: Tinkerbell
Nicky Hilton Rothschild (her sister)-she doesn't see you
Paris (she doesn't see you)
11212211.content:
Her gagging causes her tongue to flick you straight from her mouth hurdling down towards her lap though luckily her soft thighs and dress break your fall.

"Eeeek! You little pest-you almost made me puke!" she snaps. "I hope you at least got what I sent you in for?" You manage to lift one arm in which you still have the hunk of food in you hand to display it to her. She nods approvingly and then scoops you up in her hands and then shoves you deep into her purse just behind a box of mints. "Well-my little slave-now that I've got what I came here for-I guess there's no point at staying in this shithole of hotel anymore. With that-she zips the cover of the purse and everything goes dark as you feel your world begin to shake and rumble and realize that Paris is on the move. After 15 very uncomfortable minutes of being jostled around in her purse between all the items inside it-you suddenly feel the motion stop and you wonder what's going on. You notice a small sliver of light and realize that a part of the zipper became undone throughout all shaking and and begin to hike up some of the various items in her purse until you reach a pen that's sticking up and shimmy up it until you're close enough to make a jump for the opening. You leap and barely grasp onto the edge of the purse's fabric. As you climb through the opening-you behold a giant and beautiful world around you of gold sculptures, magnificent paintings and lavish carpets and realize that you must be in Paris' penthouse (or at least one of them). You crawl down the fabric of the purse and realize that you're on the ground and that no one is around. Paris must have thought that you were secure in your purse cage and left to do something else. Realizing that you must act quickly before she returns-you try to run as fast and far as possible to get away from the purse-when suddenly you hear pounding footsteps and look behind you to behold...
11212211.title: Out of her mouth-into her lap

choices: Paris bedroom and Paris is asleep
Paris' sister Nicky's bedroom
The kitchen and Paris is eating dinner at the table
112122111.content:
You gasp but then breath a sigh of relief to see the same happy slobbering face that you'd encountered before of Paris' Chihuahua Tinkerbell.

"Hey Tinks" you exclaim at the giant dog "Come here and give me a lift!" The dog leans its head down and after you endure about a solid minute of being drenched in dog saliva-you grab Tinkerbell's collar and climb up it to mount the giant beast.

"Ok Tink-let's move!" you say giving a tug to the dog's collar. Somehow-the dog seems to take your meaning and begin to gallup around the house in search of something-maybe food, maybe an interesting smell, or maybe even her master. She enters through the crack in a half open door and after a few second upon entering you realize that you and the dog are now in....
112122111.title: Tinkerbell

info.brief_description: I was watching the doc this is Paris recently..
info.description:
Paris Hilton grows herself or shrinks you and you get to interact with her and a whole new level...

Please limit the toilet stuff
If you kill the main character-make a new one to keep the story going
Absolutely NO underage stuff (will be deleted)
Keep it fun and try to keep threads going....
